title: Considering all the posts that hate the new hud, I'm gonna make one pointing out the good features.
body:
The new hud lets you see enemy respawn timers without pushing tab.

You have more of your relevant stats easily visible.

it fully opened up both sides of the screen.

all of the info that's important is down, and not scattered across the screen randomly.

This seems like a change that is for the better in a lot of regards. Dont think I like the new hud though, I just wanted to point out some of the benefits.

replies.body: Not to mention the new side by side tab interface, which is sortable for quick easy comparison.

Youre gonna get downvoted to hell unforunately. Because apparently everything thinks by having everything in one spot it is suddenly cramped. Because they cant take a moment to think that MAYBE change is good and you just need to get used to it.
the people just gotta listen to papa kha'zix, "Change is good"

Look where changes brought him.

To the trash bin.
hey man, kha'zix started by being op as shit, then the trash bin. maybe the hud will go backwards from here.
Funny, how everything you listed in the OP is what people are complaining about.
I haven't found anyone complaining about the first point.

And I did. Like 5 minutes ago.

Comment was more or less "_just more clutter in the right corner, we already could easily check enemy death timers by clicking TAB_"

I just can't play the game with the new hud. I stopped playing and I am currently looking at a few mods to get so I can continue playing, it would be shameful if I had to stop playing just because Riot is turning into Google+
